text.Contract title and description: Glider Support Contract
text.KPI name and description: The Contractor must provide one [fuelled] Aerotow aircraft available for 90% of the Central Gliding School (CGS) Measure Points over a calendar month.
text.Comments: During a planned annual maintenance the Aerotow asset suffered a technical issue that was out with the maintenance programme; this extended the maintenance period which resulted in non-availability of the Aerotow Capability.  This was primarily due to a supply chain issue, resulting due to parts being delayed by customs, and Serco provided a performance improvement letter that addressed this for future similar instances and lessons learned.  The collaborative and collegiate approach taken by MOD and Serco Limited will ensure future instances are limited and that and an agreed approach to reporting and billing is in place.

text.Contract title and description: FUEL HEDGING PROGRAMME RE-LET
text.KPI name and description: To provide an ongoing financial instrument that allows MOD to mitigate fuel price changes and mitigate budget uncertainty’
text.Good target: Supplier has provided all funds to MOD on time (less than30 days) where the price of Fuel has exceeded the hedge price or has invoiced MOD within this timescale were the supplier is due the balance between a lower fuel price and the hedge price
